application.title: Task Management System
application.description: Enterprise Task Management Application with Project and Team Management capabilities

navigation.title: Task Board
navigation.functional_specs: Drag-drop interface for task management with status columns (Todo/In Progress/Review/Complete). Features: Create/Edit/Delete tasks, comments, attachments, subtasks. Fields: Title, Description, Priority, Status, Dates, Hours, Assignments

navigation.title: Project Setup
navigation.functional_specs:
PROJECT MANAGEMENT SPECIFICATION

1. FORMS

1.1 Project Header Form
Input Groups:
A. Basic Information
- Project Name (Text, Required, Max 100 chars, Unique)
- Description (Text Area, Required, Max 500 chars)
- Start Date (Date, Required, >= Current Date)
- End Date (Date, Required, > Start Date)
- Project Manager (Lookup, Required, Active Employees only)
- Status (Dropdown: Planning/Active/On Hold/Completed)
- Priority (Dropdown: High/Medium/Low)
- Client/Department (Lookup, Required)

B. Resource Planning
- Budget Hours (Numeric, Required, > 0)
- Team Members (Multi-select Lookup, Active Employees)
- Minimum Team Size (Numeric, > 0)
- Maximum Team Size (Numeric, >= Minimum Team Size)

C. Others
- Project ID (Auto-generated, Read-only)
- Created Date (System Date, Read-only)
- Last Modified (System Date, Read-only)
- Completion Percentage (Auto-calculated, Read-only)
- Consumed Hours (Auto-calculated, Read-only)

Field Level Validations:
- Project Name: No special characters except hyphen and underscore
- Budget Hours: Maximum 999999
- Team Members: Cannot exceed Maximum Team Size
- Project Manager: Must have Project Manager role

Form Level Validations:
- End Date must be at least 1 day after Start Date
- Team size must be within Min/Max range
- Project Manager cannot be in Team Members list
- Status cannot be set to Completed if active tasks exist
- Budget Hours must be greater than sum of all task estimated hours

Form Actions:
1. create-project
- Validate all required fields
- Generate unique Project ID
- Create project record
- Initialize completion percentage to 0
- Send notification to Project Manager

2. edit-project
- Allow modifications except Project ID
- Recalculate completion percentage
- Update last modified date
- Notify affected team members if assignments change

3. archive-project
- Only allowed for Completed projects
- Move project to archive storage
- Maintain task history
- Generate project closure report

4. associate-tasks
- Link existing tasks to project
- Update task properties with project context
- Recalculate project metrics

5. default-data
- Load standard project template if selected
- Pre-populate fields based on template

Attachments:
- Project Charter (PDF/DOC)
- Project Plan (PDF/DOC/MPP)
- Team Structure Document (PDF/DOC)
- Client Requirements (PDF/DOC)

1.2 Project Dashboard Form
Input Groups:
A. Project Metrics
- Task Status Distribution
- Resource Utilization
- Timeline Progress
- Budget Consumption

B. Team Performance
- Individual Contributions
- Workload Distribution
- Skill Coverage

Cross Updates:
- Update resource allocation tables when team members change
- Modify task assignments on team member changes
- Update project metrics when tasks are modified
- Adjust department capacity when budget hours change

Follow-up Actions:
- Generate resource allocation notifications
- Schedule project kickoff meeting on creation
- Create default project milestones
- Initialize project workspace
- Setup recurring status report schedule
- Create project communication channels

The system should maintain audit trails for all significant changes without requiring explicit configuration.

navigation.title: Team Workload
navigation.functional_specs: Workload management interface showing team capacity, task assignments, skills. Features: View capacity, reassign tasks, update skills, monitor workload

navigation.title: Resource Dashboard
navigation.functional_specs: Dashboard showing resource utilization, workload distribution, task status, progress trends, and forecasts

navigation.title: Team Dashboard
navigation.functional_specs: Personal dashboard showing task status, deadlines, performance metrics, time tracking

navigation.title: Task Performance
navigation.functional_specs: Report showing task metrics: ID, Title, Assignment, Dates, Status, Hours, Delays

navigation.title: Project Progress
navigation.functional_specs: Project progress report with completion rates, resource utilization, milestone status
